channel.title: Command makes you weild an item?
channel.description:
Source: Battlescape
Question: How can I make a command that makes player weild items automatically?
Note: I do not want it to be spawned into the inventory, I want it to be automatically weilded.
My guessed format: [code]if (Command.equals("whip")) { ~player equipment method of adding 4151 into weapon slot here~ }[/code]

item.title: Command makes you weild an item?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Try this: (for PI)
EDIT: I think Battlescape is Delta… /:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("whip")) { c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); int itemsToAdd[] = { 4151}; for (int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } int[] equip = { 4151}; for (int i = 0; i < equip.length; i++) { c.playerEquipment[i] = equip[i]; c.playerEquipmentN[i] = 1; c.getItems().setEquipment(equip[i], 1, i); } c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

If it doesn’t work, post the errors. I just whipped it up real quick.
